alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Southern Mountains; Southwest Utah; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 4:52PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT SOUTH CENTRAL MILLARD...CENTRAL BEAVER AND NORTHEASTERN IRON COUNTIES... At 451 PM MST...A snow squall was along a line extending from 18 miles northwest of Milford to 27 miles northwest of Parowan to 15 miles northwest of Enoch...and moving northeast at 60 mph. Locations impacted include... Milford, Minersville, Adamsville, Lund and Black Rock. This includes Utah Route 21 between mile markers 47 and 104. * winds in excess of 25 mph are possible with this squall. * visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this squall. Rapid visibility reduction and potentially icy roads are likely to produce hazardous driving conditions. travel is not advised during this snow squall. If you are traveling and encounter adverse winter driving conditions, reduce speed and make sure headlights are on to increase the visibility of your vehicle to those around you.
